result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for managing various discovery services including announcements, collections, contacts, events, feature banners, home banners, layouts, products, service items, and trending tokens.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file defines a specific service interface and its implementation, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/services/discovery/announcement.purpose: This file defines the announcement service for managing banners and widget items in the discovery module.

internal/services/discovery/collection.g.purpose: Defines the collection service for managing and retrieving collection data.

internal/services/discovery/contact.go.purpose: Provides a service for managing contact-related operations in the discovery module.

internal/services/discovery/data.go.purpose: Provides a data service for fetching collection statistics from an external API.

internal/services/discovery/event.go.purpose: Defines the Event service interface and its implementation for managing discovery events.

internal/services/discovery/feature_bann.purpose: Defines the FeatureBanner service interface and its implementation for managing feature banners in the discovery service.

internal/services/discovery/generic.go.purpose: Provides generic discovery services for handling images and social platform interactions.

internal/services/discovery/helpers.go.purpose: Provides helper functions for managing social platform contacts in the discovery service.

internal/services/discovery/home_banner..purpose: Defines the HomeBanner service interface and its implementation for managing home banners in the discovery module.

internal/services/discovery/layout.go.purpose: Defines the layout service for managing layouts and widgets in the discovery module.

internal/services/discovery/product.go.purpose: This file defines a service for managing products and dapps within the discovery module.

internal/services/discovery/service_item.purpose: Defines the ServiceItem interface and its implementation for managing layout services and widget items.

internal/services/discovery/token.go.purpose: Defines a service for managing trending tokens in a discovery context.
